content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Marina Centre" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2019)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Downtown Core Planning Area in Singapore **Marina Central** or Marina Centre ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese): 滨海中心; [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language): *Marina Pusat*) is a zone of [reclaimed land](/wiki/Land_reclamation) within the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core) in the southern part of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Together with the [Marina South](/wiki/Marina_South) area, it encloses the sheltered [Marina Bay](/wiki/Marina_Bay,_Singapore). [Suntec City](/wiki/Suntec_City), [Marina Square](/wiki/Marina_Square), [Millenia Walk](/wiki/Millenia_Walk), [Esplanade – Theatres on the Bay](/wiki/Esplanade_%E2%80%93_Theatres_on_the_Bay) and [South Beach Tower](/wiki/South_Beach_Tower) are located within Marina Central. ## Hotels - [Marina Mandarin Singapore](/wiki/Marina_Mandarin_Singapore) - managed by Meritus Hotels & Resorts - [Mandarin Oriental Singapore](/wiki/Mandarin_Oriental_Singapore) - formerly The Oriental Singapore - [The Pan Pacific Singapore](/wiki/The_Pan_Pacific_Singapore) - [Raffles Hotel Singapore](/wiki/Raffles_Hotel_Singapore) - [Fairmont Singapore](/wiki/Fairmont_Singapore) - formerly Raffles The Plaza, prior to that Westin Plaza - [Swissotel The Stamford](/wiki/Swissotel_The_Stamford) - formerly Westin Stamford - [The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore](/wiki/The_Ritz-Carlton_Millenia_Singapore) - [Conrad Centennial Singapore](/wiki/Conrad_Centennial_Singapore) - [JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach](/wiki/JW_Marriott_Hotels) - [The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore](/wiki/Capitol_Building,_Singapore) ## Shopping malls - [Marina Square](/wiki/Marina_Square) - [Suntec City Mall](/wiki/Suntec_City) - [CityLink Mall](/wiki/CityLink_Mall) - [Raffles City Shopping Centre](/wiki/Raffles_City_Shopping_Centre) - [Millenia Singapore](/wiki/Millenia_Singapore) This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Marina Centre
